FILE: cm373630v11.0.txt
DYAD: AZERBAIJAN - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV1031
DISPUTE(S): MID4317 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190216
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190216

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4409 

TERRMID: MID4409 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4409 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4409 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4409 from cm narrative, an Iranian naval vessel entered Azeri waters on 2/22/2002. An Azeri border patrol boat then escorted the Iranian vessel out of Azeri waters. The Iranian ship then returned to the area with additional naval vessels. From Gilber 2018, Azerbaijan and Iran had conflicting claims in the Caspian Sea due to oil deposits desired by both countries. Coded maritime MID because this was connected to a maritime dispute. 

ISLMID: MID4409 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4409 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4409 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4409 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4409 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4409 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4418 

TERRMID: MID4418 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4418 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4418 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4418 from cm narrative, in 2003 the Azeri military went on alert on 5/27/2003 after Iranian planes violated Azeri airspace. From BBC 2003, the violation happened over disputed waters, and Iran claimed the violation occurred because the boundary was unclear. Coded maritime MID because this was connected to a maritime dispute. 

ISLMID: MID4418 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4418 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4418 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4418 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4418 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4418 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4317 

TERRMID: MID4317 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4317 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4317 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4317 from Gibler 2018, Iran crossed into Azerbaijani waters in the disputed Caspian Sea and threatened to fire on a research vessel. Iranian planes also buzzed the research vessel. Coded maritime MID because this was connected to a maritime dispute in the oil-rich Caspian Sea. 

ISLMID: MID4317 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4317 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4317 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4317 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4317 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4317 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4409
rivalry=373630 nationa=IRAN nationb=AZERBAIJAN MID4409 20020222-20020222 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
DISPLAY OF FORCE 

An Iranian naval vessel entered Azeri waters on 2/22/2002. An Azeri border patrol boat then escorted the Iranian vessel out of Azeri waters. The Iranian ship then returned to the area with additional naval vessels. First day of dispute is listed on 2/22/2002 and last day of dispute is listed on 2/22/2002. 

MID4418
rivalry=373630 nationa=IRAN nationb=AZERBAIJAN MID4418 20030527-20030527 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=POLICY revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
DISPLAY OF FORCE 

The Azeri military went on alert on 5/27/2003 after Iranian planes violated Azeri airspace. First day of dispute is listed on 5/27/2003 and last day of dispute is listed on 5/27/2003.

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4317
rivalry=373630 nationa=IRAN nationb=AZERBAIJAN MID4317 20010723-20011200 
 revtype1a=OTHER revtype2a=POLICY fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
DISPLAY OF FORCE 

Iran is trying to get "a larger share of the oil-rich inland sea [Caspian] than it has under the current configuration of boundaries," according to AFP 8/3/01. Azerbaijan says Iran is violating international law, but does not want relations to worsen. First day of dispute was on 7/23/2001 and last day of dispute was on 12/00/2001.

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 
BBC Summary of World Events (2003). "Iranian envoy rejects Azeri claims of airspace violation." BBC June 5 2003.
